attributes.action: Teach Sign Language in all UK schools at all levels as part of the curriculum.
attributes.additional_details:
People who are hard of hearing or totally deaf and rely on sign language should not need to be living a life where few are able to communicate or to have to rely on technology. 
Every UK citizen should be able to communicate with one another.
attributes.background: We want sign language to be taught in all UK schools. For it to be an obligatory qualification such as GCSE. It should be taught from pre-school or primary schools through to secondary  schools as part of the national curriculum.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599565
